<!-- This issue tracker is only for technical issues related to woodcoin Core.

General woodcoin questions and/or support requests and are best directed to the [woodcointalk.io forums](https://woodcointalk.io/).

For reporting security issues, please contact the woodcoin developers on the #woodcoin-dev Freenode IRC channel or alternatively you can email us at contact@woodcoin.org.

If the node is "stuck" during sync or giving "block checksum mismatch" errors, please ensure your hardware is stable by running memtest and observe CPU temperature with a load-test tool such as linpack before creating an issue! -->
